text: We tried NOT to eat in the buffet restaurant as the quality and choice of food was very limited , The reception area was clean and the lobby staff were very helpful , The house · keeping was basic but not impressive , The pool , bar & beach areas were kept tidy and the outdoor staff were pleasant. there were quite a lot of Russian guests there ( approx 85 % ) with a minority of British , French , swedish , German , Norwiegen & Egyptian .
